question: Which of the following ministries is providing Pehchan Identity Cards (PIC) to workers associated with the Industry?
option3: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
explanation: Pehchan Initiative was launched by the Ministry of Textiles on 7 October 2016. Under this scheme, Pehchan identity cards are issued to artisans. It aims at the better targeting of artisans to enable their easy and smooth access to the benefit they are entitled to. All state governments and union territories are involved in the identification and authentification of the Pehchan ID Cards.
